Description of incident: The FDIC announced a data breach that affected 44,000 customers when an employee who was leaving inadvertently downloaded sensitive information onto a portable hard drive device unknowingly.The FDIC has not provided the specific information that was compromised but did state that the employee had authority to access personal information  “for bank resolution and receivership purposes.”More Information: https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/powerpost/wp/2016/04/11/inadvertent-...
